The Graveside Phantoms are monsters involved in the Lost Souls event in Wilderness Flash Events.

Players can kill them for three pieces of ectoplasm each. The ectoplasm must then be given to the reanimated skeleton in the area to succeed in the event. All players who did damage will receive the drop when the phantom is defeated.

Their life points scale according to the number of players in the area. Possible values are between 8,000, 12,500, 14,750, 34,000, 44,000, 53,000 84,000, and 140,000. The life points scales with the number of players participating in the event, determined by the expression 8000+2250N, where N is the number of players involved.
